headline: PepsiCo Appoints Christine Tammara Senior Vice President and Controller
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ: PEP) today announced that Christine Tammara has been appointed Senior Vice President and Controller effective May 3, 2025, succeeding Senior Vice President and Controller Marie Gallagher, who previously announced her intention to retire. Tammara will report to PepsiCo Chief Financial Officer Jamie Caulfield.
